column2: an A.M. Eatery////We stopped in the Houston location before our flight out. It did not disappoint. The wait to be seated was fairly short for a Tuesday morning. Once seated
column3: our server could've been a little more attentive and we waited a little while for our food but I must say it was well worth the wait. We ordered the OMG French toast
column4: scrambled eggs with hash browns and chorizo. Pineapple upside down pancakes
column6: and grits. Everything is as delicious. I was t a fan of the chorizo but I've never had it before so my impression should be taken with a grain of salt as it relates to the chorizo. We will definitely return.
